lead_paragraph: Front The Dublin Journal. A poor man, named J. Carson, died on the 19th at Banbridge, of this fearful disease. The following, writes a correspondent, are the particulars of his case: Being out working on the 22d June last, the deceased saw a stray greyhound, which he took possession of, brought home, and tied in the corner of the kitchen.

headline.main: FOREIGN GLEANINGS.; Horrible Case of Hydrophobia.
